mapper.select: SELECT M.USER_NO, BUSINESS_NAME AS BUSINESS_NAME, POSITION_NAME AS POSITION_NAME, E.USER_NAME AS MANAGER_NAME, M.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME, M.USER_ID AS USER_ID, M.USER_PWD AS USER_PWD, M.EMAIL AS EMAIL, M.SALARY AS SALARY, M.BONUS AS BONUS, M.PHONE AS PHONE, M.GENDER AS GENDER, M.ADDRESS AS ADDRESS, M.CREATE_DATE AS CREATE_DATE, M.IMAGE_CHANGEPATH AS IMAGE_CHANGEPATH, M.IMAGE_ORIGINPATH AS IMAGE_ORIGINPATH, M.BIRTHDAY AS BIRTHDAY, M.STATUS AS STATUS FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN BUSINESS ON M.BUSINESS_NO = BUSINESS.BUSINESS_NO LEFT JOIN POSITION ON M.POSITION_NO = POSITION.POSITION_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER E ON M.USER_NO = E.USER_NO WHERE M.USER_ID = #{userId} AND M.STATUS = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, EMAIL, GENDER, AGE, PHONE, ADDRESS ) VALUES( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{address} )
